sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM1200 ( DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , GTWK_STD_TM , OFWK_STD_TM , ERY_GTWK_BGNN_TM , ERY_GTWK_END_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , EXTNN_EVNG_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_END_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_MEAL_INSN_YN , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dutyDivCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , #gtwkStdTm# , #ofwkStdTm# , #eryGtwkBgnnTm# , #eryGtwkEndTm# , #norMogDutyBgnnTm# , #norMogDutyEndTm# , #norDutyLuchBgnnTm# , #norDutyLuchEndTm# , #norDutyAftnBgnnTm# , #norDutyAftnEndTm# , #norDutyTmNum# , #extnnEvngBgnnTm# , #extnnEvngEndTm# , #extnnDutyBgnnTm# , #extnnDutyEndTm# , #extnnEvngMealInsnYn# , #ngtDutyBgnnTm# , #ngtDutyEndTm# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSM1200 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , GTWK_STD_TM=#gtwkStdTm# , OFWK_STD_TM=#ofwkStdTm# , ERY_GTWK_BGNN_TM=#eryGtwkBgnnTm# , ERY_GTWK_END_TM=#eryGtwkEndTm# , NOR_MOG_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#norMogDutyBgnnTm# , NOR_MOG_DUTY_END_TM=#norMogDutyEndTm# , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_BGNN_TM=#norDutyLuchBgnnTm# , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_END_TM=#norDutyLuchEndTm# , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_BGNN_TM=#norDutyAftnBgnnTm# , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_END_TM=#norDutyAftnEndTm# , NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM=#norDutyTmNum# , EXTNN_EVNG_BGNN_TM=#extnnEvngBgnnTm# , EXTNN_EVNG_END_TM=#extnnEvngEndTm# , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#extnnDutyBgnnTm# , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM=#extnnDutyEndTm# , EXTNN_EVNG_MEAL_INSN_YN=#extnnEvngMealInsnYn# , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM=#ngtDutyBgnnTm# , NGT_DUTY_END_TM=#ngtDutyEndTm# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM1200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , GTWK_STD_TM , OFWK_STD_TM , ERY_GTWK_BGNN_TM , ERY_GTWK_END_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , EXTNN_EVNG_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_END_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_MEAL_INSN_YN , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , GTWK_STD_TM , OFWK_STD_TM , ERY_GTWK_BGNN_TM , ERY_GTWK_END_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NOR_MOG_DUTY_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_LUCH_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_BGNN_TM , NOR_DUTY_AFTN_END_TM , NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , EXTNN_EVNG_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_END_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_BGNN_TM , EXTNN_DUTY_END_TM , EXTNN_EVNG_MEAL_INSN_YN , NGT_DUTY_BGNN_TM , NGT_DUTY_END_TM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1200 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DUTY_DIV_CD DESC , EMYMT_DIV_CD DESC , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSM1200 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
